Sentencas: The direct electrochemical oxidation of coal gas was studied by pyrolyzing a sample of Ohio 45 coal in flowing Ar at 700, 800, 900, and 950 degrees C and transporting the resulting gaseous products to a Cu (Copper) anode solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operated at 950 degrees C. Pyrolysis of coal at 700 degrees C produced a H-2-rich Coal gas containing 89% H-2, 4% CO, 6% CH4, 1% CO2, and sulfur compounds (i.e. 1% COS and 1% SO2), which yielded a maximum current density of 320 mA/cm(2) at 0.5 V.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Raising the pyrolysis temperature from 700 to 950 degrees C increased the CO concentration in the coal gas (i.e., 42 vol % CO), which lit turn reduced the fuel cell maximum current density.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: No sulfur compounds were present in the coal gas produced at temperatures higher than 700 degrees C. Coal gas fuel operation did not degrade the fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A fuel composition of 25 vol % CH4 in He generated a current density of 340 mA/cm(2) at 0.5 V.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: These results demonstrated that the Cu anode is effective For the electrochemical Oxidation Of sulfur-containing coal gas at 950 degrees C.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The addition of CO2 and D2O to the pyrolysis reactor led to the formation of CO and HD, indicating the occurrence of reforming reactions.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Diffuse reflectance infrared Fourier-transformation (DRIFT) spectra showed that coal pyrolysis proceeded by dehydrogenation of hydroaromatics, dealkylation of aromatics, and oxidation reactions.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: leading to the formation of coke with a surface Containing C-O, C-S, and S-O bonds.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The results of the fuel cell performance strongly support the feasibility of direct power generation from coal gas in a Cu-anode SOFC.
Titulo: Performance and Byproduct Analysis of Coal Gas Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
